title: OpenX Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the OpenX adapter

channel_id.description: A unique 5 digit ID that is generated by the SpotX publisher platform when a channel is created

ad_unit.description: Token that describes which ad unit to play: instream or outstream

secure.description: Boolean identifying whether the reqeusts should be https or not (used to override the protocol if the page isnâ€™t secure.

ad_volume.description: Value between 0 and 1 to denote the volume the ad should start at.

price_floor.description: Set the current channel price floor in real time.

hide_skin.description: Set to true to hide the spotx skin.
